functions.tag: {lgpTags:"formersNotes.page1",display:{Name:'{"text":"前人的字条#1","italic":false,"color":"yellow"}',Lore:['{"text":"曾经末影龙为了更好的统治主世界，在各地布下了各种诅咒。","color":"gray","italic":false}','{"text":"凋灵也为了统治主世界，在世界各地放置下界传送门（下界传送门废墟的由来），","color":"gray","italic":false}','{"text":"同样布下了诅咒。","color":"gray","italic":false}']},HideFlags:63}

{lgpTags:"pureCrystal.swamp",display:{Name:'{"text":"沼泽之晶","italic":false,"color":"#a1ff00"}',Lore:['{"text":"“沼泽之晶”是“世界之晶”的一种类型.","color":"gray","italic":false}','{"text":" "}','{"text":"","italic":false,"extra":[{"text":"[起源] ","color":"yellow","bold":true},{"text":"紫水晶遍布四方，天生具备净化之能。经年累月，诅咒魔力与之反应，","color":"white","italic":false,"bold":false}]}','{"text":"        最终它们蜕变为非凡晶体，被誉为“世界之晶”.","color":"white","italic":false,"bold":false}','{"text":" "}','{"text":"","italic":false,"extra":[{"text":"[获取] ","color":"#ADFF2F","bold":true},{"text":"*","color":"#00FF7F"},{"text":"击败史莱姆王并夺取.","color":"white"}]}','{"text":"","extra":[{"text":"        *","color":"#00FF7F"},{"text":"可在以下生物群系采集紫水晶时极低概率挖取:","color":"white","italic":false,"bold":false}]}','{"text":"             沼泽生物群系","color":"#5bff6a","italic": false}','{"text":"             红树林沼泽生物群系","color":"#5bff6a","italic": false}']},Enchantments:[{id:"minecraft:unbreaking",lvl:1}],HideFlags:63}
